posts.post_content:
I'm looking to trade some of my t205's for graded t206's (low graded). Just looking to see if there's any interest. I'll post pictures when I can or by email which may be quicker as I have them on my phone.

1. Chief Meyers - polar bear back
2. Frank Lang - sweet caporal back
3. Ed Reulbach - polar bear back
4. Ed Willett - polar bear back
5. George Stone - sweet caporal back

Open to anything really as my main focus is t206 not t205's I've decided to see what I could get for them. All cards are non graded and poor to fair condition.

[url]https://plus.google.com/u/0/photos/1...47956845705937[/url]

Additionally I have these listed on eBay "Foleyisgod4ever" is my eBay handle. You can take a look at them there. I just listed them a couple days ago. Either would like to get money for them or trade them to get low grade (SGC/PSA) t206's. 

Link to the Pictures

I'd like to see scans, but when I click on your link I get:

The page you requested is invalid.
